Name: Sergeant Cybershine
Description: Hailing from the digital battlefields of the WebtrES club, Sergeant Cybershine is a relic of the pixel wars, with a shiny yellow chassis that reflects his unyielding spirit. His red and black screen displays the scars of countless cyber skirmishes, always rearranging to show his mood in cryptic patterns. With arms and legs reinforced from his time in the soldier ranks, he's a veteran in navigating the treacherous terrain of the internet. Although he's retired from active duty, Sergeant Cybershine now serves as a guardian of the WebtrES club, always ready to spring into action with his button controls, ensuring peace and stability in the ever-evolving digital realm.
